## 0.2.1

* [Allows minor versions of dependencies to be updated](https://bitbucket.org/atlassian/atlassian-jwt-ruby/pull-requests/7).
* [Adds the licence to the gemspec](https://bitbucket.org/atlassian/atlassian-jwt-ruby/pull-requests/6) so tools like [license_finder](https://rubygems.org/gems/license_finder) wonâ€™t fail.
